answers.author: Clancy Priest
answers.text:
Hayward is already doing this.  We use Laserfiche for agenda management (workflow), you can also use SharePoint and Councilmembers use iPads to obtain final documents.  We did training for staff and Councilmembers on the iPads and use Dropbox to up-and download document via the web.  Contact me at clancy.priest@hayward-ca.gov if you have questions.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
San Mateo County, CA wants to create an automated workflow process for departments to create their documents and move them through the review process before it gets to the Board.  They also plan to provide IPADs to the Board and will discontinue the distribution of all of the paper.
Please provide documents/links to your policies, procedures, workflow plans, etc.,  Thank you in advance!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Paperless Workflow Polices/Procedures, etc.
